content: If you check to the side of the stairs first, you can find a green Wisp to absorb in a large pot, but you'll need to watch out for a Wolf Guardian standing on a wooden platform above looking to ambush you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Main Plaza'.
The content is as follows:
If you check to the side of the stairs first, you can find a green Wisp to absorb in a large pot, but you'll need to watch out for a Wolf Guardian standing on a wooden platform above looking to ambush you.
